headline: Textron Inc. (TXT) Aviation Announces Fleet Order for Cessna Citation Business Jets From Mexico’s ALE
summary: On May 21, Textron Aviation, a wholly-owned subsidiary of Textron Inc. (NYSE:TXT), announced entering into a purchase agreement for up to 12 Cessna Citation business jets with Mexico’s leading business aviation company, Aerolíneas Ejecutivas (ALE). The jets will include a mix of Citation CJ3 Gen2, Citation CJ3 Gen3, and Cessna Citation Latitude aircraft. ALE will […]
